properties.name: clientName
properties.description: Optional name of the sdk client to use.

properties.name: editable
properties.description:
Whether the conclusion can be edited. This will show a toolbar when the
user hovers over the conclusion.

properties.name: edit
properties.description: Whether the conclusion is currently in edit mode

properties.name: saveUrl
properties.description: The URL that the conclusion data will be saved to.

properties.name: saving
properties.description: Whether the conclusion is being saved

staticMethods.name: conclusionTemplate
staticMethods.description:
Here we grap the fs-conclusion-template and fill it in with the base
template of the element that uses this mixin.
